header.title: Self-Initiation Rites & Their Role in the Tradition of THEM
header.category: Western Esotericism, Occultism, Left-Hand Path, Satanism, Self-Initiation

central_thesis: The document posits that rigorous self-initiation, through specific oaths and practical demonstrations of intent, is essential for aspirants to align with the Order of THEM and the broader Sinister Tradition, facilitating the 'presencing of the Dark Gods' and achieving 'True Solidarity' via 'Remote Solidarity' within the Left-Hand Path.

structure_content.summary: This section introduces THEM as an Australian Order of six magicians dedicated to presencing Dark Gods. It outlines three foundational codes of Living—oaths to practice the Sinister, serve Satan and Sinister Aims, and restore Personal Honour, Respect, Chivalry, and Solidarity—as crucial for this presencing.

This chapter details the prerequisite for gaining access to 'MvimaedivM', the Nexus of THEM. Aspirants must undertake three separate, self-devised Self-Initiation Rites, demonstrating practical initiative, intent, and creativity to prove allegiance to THEM and its Satanic Syndicate, rather than solely intellectual interest.

This section specifies the three mandatory Self-Initiation Rites: entering an Infernal Alliance of Specie-hood with the Sinisterion (Left-Hand Path), entering an Infernal Alliance with Satan, and sealing oneself with an oath to uphold the Law of the Aeon, the Code of Personal Honour (ISS) of the Sinisterion, and to maintain Sinister Solidarity, never betraying THEM members.

This chapter explains initiation as an ordeal transforming the neophyte from a mundane to a magical existence, abandoning the old persona. It critiques common Satanic misconceptions of 'independence' that reject guidance, arguing that true initiation involves humility and learning from masters, contrasting it with Magian-influenced 'anti-Christian reactionism'.

This section describes the resources available within the Nexus ('Mvimaedivm') upon successful initiation, including extensive libraries of the Order of Nine Angles (ONA), Chaos Magick (IOT), Tempel ov Blood, and White Order of Thule works, alongside THEM's principled system of Black Magic, all aimed at guiding initiates to fulfill the outlined oaths.

structure_content.chapter_title: VI - Further Notes on Self-Initiation Rites I, II + III
structure_content.summary: This section elaborates on the practical execution of the three rites. It emphasizes 'border experiences' that confront one's humanity, leading to a revelation of one's personal Sinister quest and the development of a profound sense of 'Remote Solidarity' as a vow of no betrayal, ultimately achieving ISS.

key_concepts.definition: An Australian-based Order of six magicians working to presence the Dark Gods by re-establishing specific codes of Living within the Sinister Tradition.
Refers to the collective body of Left-Hand Path practitioners who share a 'Specie-hood' or common identity, into which aspirants are initiated through an Infernal Alliance.

Known as the 'Nexus', this is an internal knowledge and resource repository maintained by THEM, access to which is granted only after an aspirant successfully completes the prescribed Self-Initiation Rites.

A Living Code embodying sworn Loyalty, Personal Honour, Respect, Chivalry, and Solidarity among members of THEM and the wider Sinister Syndicate. It emphasizes a professional, fair, and non-simpering approach to interaction within the group, and is distinct from surface niceties or pseudo-moralism.

An esoteric or magical unity achieved in the acausal world, transcending physical proximity or mental congregation. It binds adepts and neophytes as 'one Expression of Satan' to achieve supra-personal goals, and is understood as the ultimate realization of ISS by those who have passed the Abyss and controlled the ego.
The entities THEM explicitly intends to 'presence' (make manifest or immanent) into the world, with the restoration of specific codes of Living being a 'vitally important way' to aid this process.

Three distinct, self-devised practical rituals undertaken by aspirants to demonstrate allegiance and intent. These rites, which can be Hermetic or based on the ONA 'Naos' instructions, culminate in specific oaths and are required for entry into Mvimaedivm.

A pejorative term used to describe distortions, confusions, and philosophical traps (often linked to Christianity or its inversions, or general materialism/capitalism) that hinder genuine Sinister awareness, true independence, and solidarity, leading to egotism and superficiality within occult movements.
A guiding principle within the Sinister Tradition, implied to be upheld through initiatory oaths, signifying adherence to the overarching magical and historical currents recognized by THEM.

practical_system.description: The system outlines a self-initiated pathway designed to align the aspirant with the 'Tradition of THEM' and the broader Sinisterion. It moves beyond mere intellectual curiosity, requiring active demonstration of 'Intent and Creativity' through self-devised rituals. The core process involves undertaking three specific Self-Initiation Rites, which culminate in profound oaths of allegiance to the Sinisterion, Satan, and the core ethical codes of THEM (ISS). Successful completion grants access to 'Mvimaedivm,' a repository of advanced occult knowledge and resources, where further development is supported by a community committed to 'Personal Honour, Respect, Chivalry, and Solidarity,' ultimately fostering 'Remote Solidarity' as a higher form of unity.
tools: Personal Intent and Creativity (for devising and executing rites)
The Nexus 'Mvimaedivm' (as a knowledge and resource repository)
Instructions from the ONA book 'Naos' (for ONA-specific rites, if chosen)
The Codes of Living (I, II, III on page 1) embodying Personal Honour, Respect, Chivalry, and Solidarity.
rituals: Undertake a Rite of Self-Initiation to enter into an Infernal Alliance of Specie-hood with the Sinisterion (Left-Hand Path).
Undertake a Rite of Self-Initiation to enter into an Infernal Alliance with Satan.

Undertake a Rite of Initiation to Seal oneself with the promise to uphold the Law of the Aeon and the Code of Personal Honour (ISS) of the Sinisterion + to enter into an Infernal Alliance to remain In Sinister Solidarity with the Brethren of the LHP + Never to betray any of the members of THEM, on pain of Death.
These rites can be 'Hermetic (i.e. Rites devised by oneself)' or follow 'the ONA Self-Initiation Rite as per the instructions given in the book 'Naos''.

The practical performance involves 'border experiences' (e.g., climbing a mountain, venturing into a desert/cave, spending a night in the wilderness, mushroom trips, visiting sites of massacres, exposing oneself to elements) designed to confront the practitioner with the limits of their humanity and existence, leading to revelations about their Sinister quest and fostering a sense of acausal solidarity.

relevant_quotes.text: THEM is an Australian-based Order of six magicians working with the express intention of presencing the Dark Gods.

How you perform the three Rites is entirely up to you - by whatever system you find comfortable. The nature of the three Rites is not limited by any restrictions placed upon the Initiate; however no access will be given into Mvimaedivm until proof of Initiation has been received.

THEM will say this only once: Making a formal contract is a very early and deliberate expression of the Will and the Proper Intent by an aspiring magician to accept to be guided by a Form until such time the new Initiate is able to understand and know the Form and break away from the guidance and make their own way forward.

True Solidarity is achieved by an esoteric or magical unity not in the causal world but in the acausal world where restraints of the Matrix such as Time and Space are irrelevant and both the beginning Neophyte and the adept Magus are joined/bound as one Expression of Satan by their sworn Duty to achieve the supra-personal/far-reaching goals of the Sinister Tradition.
Simplicity is always to be kept in these matters.

critical_analysis.relevance: This document is highly relevant to contemporary Left-Hand Path and Sinister magical currents, especially those influenced by the Order of Nine Angles (ONA) and its emphasis on practical, experiential initiation. It critiques superficial 'independence' in Satanism, advocating for a disciplined approach involving oaths, guidance, and a distinct form of solidarity. It provides a clear, practical framework for aspirants seeking a structured, yet self-directed, path within a fiercely independent yet cohesive Sinister tradition, differentiating itself from 'Magian-driven' or 'pseudo-moralistic' occult groups.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The target audience consists primarily of aspirants interested in Left-Hand Path, Sinister magic, or traditional Satanism who seek rigorous self-initiation and structured guidance. This includes individuals disillusioned with less demanding or 'Magian-infected' occult groups, those familiar with or interested in the ONA, Chaos Magick, or similar traditions, and practitioners seeking to deepen their understanding of concepts like personal honour, solidarity, and the presencing of Dark Gods within a specific, disciplined framework.
